thread.title: Jake Tapper on Trump Speech: ‘This is One of the Most Radical Inaugural Speeches We’ve Ever Heard’
thread.title_full: Jake Tapper on Trump Speech: ‘This is One of the Most Radical Inaugural Speeches We’ve Ever Heard’

author: Justin Baragona
title: Jake Tapper on Trump Speech: ‘This is One of the Most Radical Inaugural Speeches We’ve Ever Heard’
text:
Jake Tapper on Trump Speech: ‘This is One of the Most Radical Inaugural Speeches We’ve Ever Heard’ by Justin Baragona | 12:47   Video 
Following President Donald Trump’ s inauguration speech after he was sworn into office, CNN anchor Jake Tappe r noted how populist it was. 
“It was very consistent to the Trump brand absolutely,” Tapper explained. “I have to say, I think it’s fair to say this is one of the most radical inaugural speeches we’ve ever heard.” 
He conitnuned, “It was purely populist. It talked about the forgotten people. It attacked Washington while standing inside the center of Washington, D.C. surrounded by Washington insiders.” 
Watch the clip above, via CNN. 
[image via screengrab]
